| Property | Attribute | Description        | Type                                                           | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | alert variant type | `AlertTypes.ERROR \| AlertTypes.SUCCESS \| AlertTypes.WARNING` | `undefined` |
